scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm --workspace packages/shared run build && npm --workspace packages/ethos-sdk run build
scripts.build:apps: npm --workspace apps/ethos-clinic run build && npm --workspace apps/ethos-control-plane run build && npm --workspace apps/ethos-transcriber run build && npm --workspace apps/ethos-desktop run build
scripts.test:apps: npm --workspace apps/ethos-clinic run test && npm --workspace apps/ethos-control-plane run test
